attributes.action: Change the address of the Russian Embassy to Volodymyr Zelenskyy Gardens
attributes.background: In a show of solidarity with the citizens of Ukraine, to change the address of the Russian Embassy to ‘Volodymyr Zelenskyy Gardens’.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
